svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Global and regional population estimates (US Census Bureau vs. UN)
Global and regional population trends as estimated by the US Census Bureau and the United Nations Population
Division, measured as the total population across all ages and sexes.
Latin America and the Caribbean - US
Source: Global population trends - US Census Bureau (2017), UN Population Division (2017 Revision)
